title: echa123
author: echa123
created_time: March 19, 2023, 01:40:00 PMLast edit: March 19, 2023, 02:20:29 PM by echa123
content: Hello friends good evening I hope you are in good healthI'm looking for someone who can help me to open my Old FACEBOOK account. because I have to finish old work looking for an old friend that I forgot. please if anyone is willing, there will be a special gift for you if you can reopen, please contact me on this forum or you can send a message on my Telegram: https://t.me/zorojuro4

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Why title indicate WTS?  Want to sell? No one can help you aside from yourself because you're the only one who knows the credentials of your account. Related articles on how to recover an FB account is here, https://www.facebook.com/help/mobile-basic/231208473756221.

comments.author: echa123
comments.body: Quote from: sheenshane on March 19, 2023, 01:52:12 PMWhy title indicate WTS?  Want to sell? No one can help you aside from yourself because you're the only one who knows the credentials of your account. Related articles on how to recover an FB account is here, https://www.facebook.com/help/mobile-basic/231208473756221.EDIT - ok and I sent support but not good news .notyet solve ,

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: echa123 on March 19, 2023, 02:22:30 PMQuote from: sheenshane on March 19, 2023, 01:52:12 PMWhy title indicate WTS?  Want to sell? No one can help you aside from yourself because you're the only one who knows the credentials of your account. Related articles on how to recover an FB account is here, https://www.facebook.com/help/mobile-basic/231208473756221.EDIT - ok and I sent support but not good news .notyet solve ,if you don't have an answer from the official Facebook, what do you expect to get here? as far as I know, FB does not have its representatives here.the assumption remains that you are looking for someone to hack that account, which sounds a bit illegal. why would anyone do that for you with some small compensation? Also, can you prove that is your account, and it's not from some third person whose account you want to take over?in the end, you can always open a new account, not a big deal, I've seen it many times.
